dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Almaty to Seoul, twice a week—Eastar Jet just launched that route.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Almaty to Seoul, twice a week-Eastar Jet just launched that route.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A South Korean low-cost airline has launched a new flight route between Almaty and Seoul. The airline operates direct, regular passenger flights on the Seoul " Almaty route twice a week, the Ministry of Transport's press service reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I saw that! It started back on April 7, right? A new budget option for that corridor.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I saw that! It started back on April seven, right? A new budget option for that corridor.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Flights have been available since April 7, as Eastar Jet, a new budget airline from South Korea, entered the Kazakh aviation market.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And it sounds like the governments have been working behind the scenes—Kazakhstan and South Korea expanded their aviation agreement just last month.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And it sounds like the governments have been working behind the scenes-Kazakhstan and South Korea expanded their aviation agreement just last month.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry noted that in March 2024, the aviation authorities of the two countries agreed to expand the legal framework and approved carriers for regular flights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mmm, which probably paved the way for more carriers. I think Saltanat Tompieva, from the Civil Aviation Committee, uh, mentioned even more budget airlines are coming next year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mmm, which probably paved the way for more carriers. I think Saltanat Tompieva, from the Civil Aviation Committee, uh, mentioned even more budget airlines are coming next year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Interestingly, in early April, Saltanat Tompieva, Chair of the Civil Aviation Committee, named the low-cost airlines expected to enter the Kazakh market in 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! T'way, SpiceJet, AirAsia X… it's like a low-cost invasion, in a good way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! T'way, SpiceJet, AirAsia X... it's like a low-cost invasion, in a good way.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These include South Korean carriers T'way and Eastar Jet, India's SpiceJet, and Thailand's AirAsia X.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. More competition usually means better prices for travelers, especially on routes like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. More competition usually means better prices for travelers, especially on routes like that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And direct flights too—no layovers, which is huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And direct flights too-no layovers, which is huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The airline operates direct, regular passenger flights on the Seoul " Almaty route twice a week, the Ministry of Transport's press service reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think this'll put pressure on the bigger, legacy carriers on that route?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think this'll put pressure on the bigger, legacy carriers on that route?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, Eastar's already in there shaking things up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, Eastar's already in there shaking things up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how Central Asia is opening up to these budget options. Not something you saw even five years ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how Central Asia is opening up to these budget options. Not something you saw even five years ago.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And with India's SpiceJet coming too? That's another massive market connecting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And with India's SpiceJet coming too? That's another massive market connecting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These include South Korean carriers T'way and Eastar Jet, India's SpiceJet, and Thailand's AirAsia X.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what other routes might pop up. Maybe we'll see more connections across Asia without breaking the bank.
